here double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here charming rectangle afghan pattern pick your favorite way to start a circle or square playlist above row 1 make circle chain 3 2 double_crochet into center of circle chain 3 *3 double_crochet into circle chain 3 repeat from * 2 more times slip_stitch into first double_crochet stitch made in this row you ll have 4 sides of 3 double_crochet and 4 corners of chain 3 row 2 start at any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet all into that corner space *chain 1 skip 3 sts 3 double_crochet into the next open space chain 1 skip 3 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet into the next corner space repeat from * around slip_stitch into the 1st chs made in this row row 3 start at any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet all into that corner space chain 1 to skip over any block of 3 double_crochet then 3 double_crochet into any open space the corners will all be 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet repeat row 3 for how big you want your square this will be the same pattern throughout in each open space on any side you will make 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet all into that space chain 1 to skip to the next open space in each corner space you will make 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet  i made 4 squares with 4 row each  i then joined my squares in a row with the join as you go method  video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here around the squares row 1 start at any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet into same space *chain 1 skip to next chain space 3 double_crochet into that space repeat from * for each side 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet into each corner space repeat this row 1 around the squares for how wide you want your rectangle sides/length start at any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet into same space *chain 1 skip to next chain space 3 double_crochet into that space repeat from * for the rest of this row row 2 chain 4 skip 3 sts *3 double_crochet into next previous chain space chain 1 skip to next chain space repeat from * until you have 3 sts
